document.full_text: the federal reserve is unlikely to extend its bond-buying program with the u.s. economy now on firmer footing, several fed officials said on friday, with one inflation hawk saying the fed will have to raise rates and sell assets in the "not-too-distant future."
document.title: fed unlikely to extend qe2, officials say
lines_and_colors: the federal reserve is unlikely to extend its bond-buying program with the u.s. economy now on firmer footing, several fed officials said on friday, with one inflation hawk saying the fed will have to raise rates and sell assets in the "not-too-distant future."
